rows.label: qst201322_msg0001
rows.name:
Meleph-sama! Is there
something I can do for you?

rows.label: qst201322_msg0002
rows.name:
...I have a question. Have you
seen a ship carrying children?

rows.label: qst201322_msg0003
rows.name:
No, a ship like that has
not arrived here...

rows.label: qst201322_msg0004
rows.name:
Are you certain? Did
you check the cargo?

rows.label: qst201322_msg0005
rows.name:
We conduct thorough
inspections on all vessels,
so there is no mistake.

rows.label: qst201322_msg0006
rows.name:
I see... I apologize
for taking your time.

rows.label: qst201322_msg0009
rows.name:
No... We were too straightforward
in our thinking.

rows.label: qst201322_msg0010
rows.name:
The abandoned factory where
Bahn was manufacturing artificial
Blades also has a port.

rows.label: qst201322_msg0013
rows.name:
They could dock there
without being seen.

rows.label: qst201322_msg0011
rows.name:
And the facility itself
would be a convenient place
to hide the children?

rows.label: qst201322_msg0012
rows.name:
We need to rescue them quickly...
Let's head to the abandoned factory!
